title: [CLIENT] Teemo Chroma Typo In Store

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Nothing too crazy to report here, but in the store, one of the Cottontail Teemo chroma colors being sold individually is titled "Aquarmaine." I'm pretty sure this is supposed to say "Aquamarine"... otherwise I have no idea what Aquarmaine is.

replies.body: It's a fancy new shade of blue. :3 Okay, it's a typo! We'd fixed this once in the store catalog, but it looks like it was overwritten again. I'm talking with the store bros now to get this updated again!

> [{quoted}](name=Award,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=3c2JlKZo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-01T02:16:36.012+0000)
>
> Alright, thanks. :)

Fixed! Thanks for pointing this out! <3 

https://imgur.com/a/v1bhM
